title: Ep286 Women Helping Women
description:
This week, Josh Hallmark of True Crime Bullsh** joins the gals to talk about supportive sisterhood. Topics include how ladies lie, innovative G-5 cell phones, and an effective solution to abusive husbands. Stock up on The Gals Sauvignon Blanc, make a charitable donation, and tune in for Women Helping Women.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
